AI Description: SRA-tools is a set of software tools developed by the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI) to assist with the download and analysis of high-throughput sequencing data from the Sequence Read Archive (SRA).
Core Features: Download & Extract Sequencing Data From The Sra Database, Convert Sra Data To A More Usable Format Such As Fastq, Perform Quality Control & Filtering Of Sequencing Data, Align & Map Sequencing Reads To A Reference Genome, Analyze & Visualize Sequencing Data For Various Bioinformatics Applications
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Hpc Tools, Sequence Analysis, Data Processing, High-Throughput Sequencing
